00efac33-66fe-4b86-a117-8212f1b68956: Deals the same {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} as the Purge Soul {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} to every enemy in front of the psyker.
027225f1-09bc-4d3c-b1cc-2614d2e86e00: Telepaths are psykers whose mental expertise lies in contacting and controlling the minds of others. With a single thought, a telepath can tear away his foe's sanity, induce states of numbing terror, or possess his victim's thoughts and mould their actions as if they were his own.
04adf1c1-e44b-49d5-94ab-da3723fd3d96: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} from any source other than Aftershock, the target suffers half as much mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
04fc8aa1-a241-447b-8320-45c4437de5a6: The psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat every time an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}.
06f17528-44a0-4024-af42-1011dd6cca48: A pyromancer is a master of flame, a psyker who is able to create searing infernos out of thin air. Pyromancy is one of the most spectacular and destructive forms of psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, and those who face a pyromancer in combat are oft reduced to nought but a pile of charred bones.
07009740-f762-4913-80bf-ac956eedcd96: The psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} increases by +5%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} increases by +5% at the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} of combat except the first.
0a4bbed9-e7c0-44b2-8778-6c41d0b5259d: Purge Soul deals +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies that have already damaged the psyker or any of the psyker's allies this combat.
0b147871-57d3-44d0-b880-b89629342381: The next {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} against the target will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
0cbccd4a-ad49-43b5-a2b7-44460dc6c087: The {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} of the target is reduced by −<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u>% until the end of combat for every stack.
0dc3d4df-f924-44df-aada-7bc524ba85e0: Any effect applied by the psyker that reduces enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} also reduces enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} unless it already does so.
0e0f4bf1-942e-4245-9a8a-b017828cc883: A single-target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} strike that deals the same {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} as the Purge Soul {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}.
0f73df20-6e7a-4e2f-b028-3f6a35705fbd: Biomancy focuses on manipulating living flesh and biological processes. Biomancers can heal {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and alter physical {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
110ceeac-2e61-4f34-a793-fa93003c688e: The target gains +{uip|StatBonus|2a8341087cbb458b95bbe882a366642f} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.
1303f445-efbf-4954-93f5-48fc930645f2: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
13c2e986-90b0-41f7-864f-a54535b06d2e: The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} increases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by 2 points less. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} reduces the effect on {g|Encyclopedia:VeilDegradationGlossary}veil{/g} degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.
1527d981-12fa-490b-91e6-04f7c90a3eb4:
When an enemy adjacent to an ally dies, that ally gains a stacking corpus conversion effect. If multiple allies are adjacent to the dead enemy, one is selected at random.
The psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} that targets only the target with corpus conversion will work as if the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is +2 higher, will not {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g}, will not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and will remove −1 stack of corpus conversion from the target.
167a0b73-154c-4f3d-b91e-0361a367b86b: The psyker always begins combat first in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} order.
176c063f-ae3e-49d9-8866-eb9111201706: Deals the same {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} as the Purge Soul {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} to every enemy in a line.
18acb4bb-8d26-43b0-8bac-1562231bbe2c: Every 9th successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and/or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} by the psyker and their allies combined grants the psyker +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
18be6243-54ad-4f8f-8b17-e0fb3f2ceee2:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. At the end of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
1b3a03a2-32a2-4f4a-8148-c0b91042f214: Until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all allies affected by Word of the Emperor increase their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by +(psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} / 2) (minimum 1) and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +(10 + 2 × ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}). ! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.
1c6d137f-dc0d-4de8-852c-d843fee11db9: Usage of a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} by the psyker decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}.
20d36665-f367-414d-aa0b-a42643b53529: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each. Ignores friendly targets.
21d59752-9020-4a73-b524-73c2799dda4e:
Everyone adjacent to the target point suffers <u>(from 1 to ((1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}) × psyker's staff power level))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and increased damage taken by +<u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u>% until the end of combat. The psyker also suffers this damage and effect.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
2503946e-2aa1-467f-b594-ba7bf3ef9e81: Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and have no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
25dda977-78a9-4fd9-8aae-8b2c016e791e: The target ally immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with twice the number of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {uip|ActionPoints|29b7ab2d3e2640f3ad20a5c44c300346} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, but their organism is subjected to severe stress, making them suffer <u>5% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} until the end of combat. Every action the target makes during this extra turn will also trigger this damage.
287c5acf-3420-4aec-837e-bfceb48fd87f:
The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it succeeds, the target is merely {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the target fails the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, they become blinded and suffer an additional −{uip|StatPenalty|8c86972daac142fea33bb3bc5c84396c} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} reduced by blindness and must make a Willpower resistance test at the end of each turn. The first success makes them just blinded, and second success removes the blinded effect.
28cb5950-5a5f-474e-84a6-c422c34ebff3: The target and everyone a 4-cell radius suffer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
29a1e1ad-26b1-46d4-9e1d-ed50296aaeb2: Whenever an effect applied by the psyker increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered by a target, this effect is increased by half (for example, a 20% increase {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} into a 30% increase).
2a92eab8-dcee-412a-9207-b342b71b759a: Deals double the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of Ignite to all creatures in a 12-cell line and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} until the end of combat. If the enemy's armour falls to 0, it gains the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilDegradationGlossary}warp{/g} burn effect. Warp Burn: Deals {uip|Damage|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} damage to the target at the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, with {uip|Penetration|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f31807528a974b86aa0910e46b844e9b} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
2ae4f2c9-2f35-42cd-a8d1-9b0ebecd258d: Everyone adjacent to the target point suffers <u>(from 1 to (2 × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}) × psyker's staff power level))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and increases damage suffered by them until the end of combat by +<u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u>%.
2d04502f-d5d3-438e-a0f2-f0095c61a524: The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gains the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilDegradationGlossary}warp{/g} burn effect. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
30a070f6-7643-436b-bbf9-b661bcec26b4: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.
30a282db-12a2-4210-bab7-a6a87804746b: This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} only impacts creatures suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:VeilDegradationGlossary}warp{/g} burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. Everyone adjacent to the target point suffers the effects of the Ignite psychic power.
380f6f69-5bc9-48a1-9167-101047cc2d39: Whenever the psyker kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} dealing more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} than {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of the target, the excess damage will be dealt to the enemy closest to the target.
3e5ca69c-74f4-4ae7-ba25-3bfe2aa2bce7: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used by the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, a random enemy within 2 cells from the initial target suffers half of this damage. That damage does not trigger this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} again.
3e61ced9-4da3-47cf-bf5b-1134c2ea05cd: The target suffers double the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} the Ignite {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and half the {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} of all the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} creatures within {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} of the target.
3fd7421f-98c8-49f0-b4c5-06e482aa6833: The next attack against every enemy in combat will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
433bf8b3-a947-43ea-accb-7a7e40c50d30: The psyker unleashes a torrent of (2 × psyker's staff power level) flaming projectiles, each deals (from 1 to (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}) + psyker's staff power level) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The projectiles are distributed along random trajectories. Creatures that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by 2 or more projectiles gains the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilDegradationGlossary}warp{/g} burn effect. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. Warp Burn: deals (psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2 + psy rating) damage to the target at the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, with (5 × psy rating)% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −(5 × psyker's psy rating) {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. This psychic power cannot be affected by Rapid Fire {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
48d0f5ee-01ab-4985-9ef6-1e6e04bd0645:
Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} is moved up by 2 turns in the round {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} sequence.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} may allow the psyker to have 2 turns during one round.
4b559407-cff7-44f2-ad41-488760d0da5e: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects applied by the psyker gain a {uip|CriticalChance|25d44ec9def7447e9548469634168275}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. This chance is increased by all {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.
4bdf97af-3eab-4539-9b38-a3d90df2c2ee: Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.
51645551-a3bc-4e03-b3dc-447d1533965f: Enemies, currently inflicted with {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects by the psyker, suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
5215f211-d768-4431-ba73-267e0c655bc8: Everyone in a 4-cell radius around the target and in a 4-cell radius around the psyker suffer <u>(11 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
52a40f39-db85-462d-837f-4da25f8e0916: The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. If the test succeeds, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's stave power level</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
531ef571-8b03-4041-a2cd-ba73d5091aa6: Deals {uip|Damage|3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target at the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, with {uip|Penetration|3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
5391c2ac-a53f-43b1-a153-7d58b3e3435b: The target gains +{uip|StatBonus|d4d5ca2a8f2d42ad82029a102ca0504a} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat.
57dc5e92-3a13-4692-9e8f-13dc717284e7: The psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} increases by +1% until the end of combat every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by any means.
59dcfd93-d4f2-4e43-944d-d0849fc6827b: When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of the {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.
5c61a680-2296-4e3f-811a-9a861e603938: Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.
5ccbdefb-b6eb-4a27-87f4-ec80e18ae470: When the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1, and the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by 2. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from fire no longer reduces the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
5ccdba34-8ea4-4a24-a496-eea845200ebc: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} conditions will deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Every burning creature in combat immediately suffers damage.
6112b9b9-53e3-4968-b0ef-07c8e91ba3a7: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.
647a7d8a-06bf-4f1d-88a0-230ce6e5241e:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
6851e82a-ef67-4b00-a4c3-a79140149d69: Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.
6c626611-568f-4cc6-990a-93f9481e25cf:
Deals <u>(from (1 + (psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 1) × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} / 4) to (4 + (psyker's psy rating + 1) × resolve / 4))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +50% against xenos, by +100% against Chaos worshippers or Drukhari, by +150% against daemons, and by +50% if the enemy has already damaged the psyker or any of the psyker's allies this combat. These damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} also affect any damage bonuses from other sources.
! This power does not affect targets that lack souls.
6c945b05-1df2-4a28-8131-686c84b79979: When the psyker uses a Divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.
707a56a0-b647-4b70-8099-8ea09d054510: Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
73600e3d-aed5-4bed-97bf-fe50b1f3f659: This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} costs 50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and can only be used when momentum is 175 or higher. Until the end of combat, the weapon in the psyker's hand is replaced by a sword made of sheer will. -This sword has a single-target attack and an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} (like a two-handed sword) and can be used to release a cone of fire or a line of fire (like a flamethrower). -The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this sword is the same as that of Purge Soul (with all the same {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}). -If the psyker used a force weapon, all the bonuses from that force weapon remain. For the purposes of {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and other bonuses, the Sword of Faith counts as a force weapon. -This power can be used again, increasing the damage of the sword by +psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
74316417-b0df-4d28-9b5b-92ec943b7f92: Force weapon attacks deal +{uip|DamageBonus|0618c379e430483bab1a17b2de559bc5} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and have +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|0618c379e430483bab1a17b2de559bc5}% more {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
74d42dfd-a8c3-4234-9138-382d81c4a636: The psyker makes the target attack their nearest ally. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} in order to regain control of their body.
75ebfca1-a123-4fde-9089-788d6e604486: The target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
7753778f-2006-4ac7-bc13-c43229e8e623: Each level of {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} provides the psyker access to new {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. It also strengthens damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}.
7f4fb032-396d-4406-9846-66b8715a96b1:
The next {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} against the target will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the next hit against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
864f901c-9bed-4dfe-8adc-f21c7565c0a2: Restores {uip|Heal|f51d5d8fdc8e49c4828c0180868e0be9} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the target. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} brings the target to full wounds, this power also removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} effects from the target.
87f918a1-9492-4700-9670-c0494bd529a1: When the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer {uip|Damage|8e85511b779e41548d0b57635ecfd4db} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. The same also happens when the psyker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
8e19038a-6606-48d8-bddf-8548c1d71de0: The psyker increases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} by +{uip|BonusChance|4a7f14d3eed040fca5d96b51b4d070b1}% until the end of combat.
8f5b5123-90e0-4700-9328-58779d4c7cd6: After every sixth use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.
982e5b96-accb-4d36-bf00-5125830e10fe:
The next {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
9a64d9df-7294-4b07-be9b-0596339b00b5: All allies affected by Word of the Emperor gain the Hammer of the Emperor effect. Next time they deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this damage is increased by +{uip|DamageBonus|d1c22cdb445543a08b6dbc9867503572}, and the effect is removed. ! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.
9a675543-6936-4b3b-af26-7306363feeca: Enemies that have taken {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the psyker at least once suffer a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the psyker until the end of combat.
9aca3362-10c8-496c-9164-07b166a5bd20: Sword of Faith — Line of Flame
9b6777b2-982d-4cde-844b-8dce684e12c7: All allies that are currently affected by any of the psyker's powers gain the perfect timing effect. Perfect Timing: when an ally under this effect {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, if this ally has a weapon capable of reaching the attacker and has an attack that costs 1 or less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, that ally immediately counterattacks with this weapon, and the perfect timing effect fades.
9d4fc11a-bef1-425a-93ec-59da6a0c0f40: The psyker can use a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} while being threatened by enemies in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} do not provoke attacks of opportunity even without this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.
9d8fbc8c-d26e-45df-9885-b1eea3dcb436: Enemies adjacent to the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
a1dfadfc-dadb-425d-8f41-f9daf76090ba: The psyker immediately falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, and a random minor daemon appears in the psyker's place.
a253f071-028e-4624-be74-7bbc9026aa0d: The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing the psyker for <u>psyker's staff power level</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. If the psyker is already at full wounds, this power instead heals the wounded psyker's ally with the lowest wounds.
a4e0d664-f635-469c-ad72-1a500aa51f0c: Everyone adjacent to the target point suffers <u>(from 1 to ((1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}) × psyker's staff power level))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Damage dealt by this attack to allies is reduced by the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
a6993f58-012d-4a54-9dfa-3947d8f73f15: On the first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} of every combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the biomancy discipline cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.
acb4a91e-2898-45f6-8c15-39bb37ee7b51: Everyone within a 7-cell radius cone in front of the psyker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and is forced to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
adf82f4b-86b0-4ebf-8d54-be11f16f6d79: The psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} that have a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of 2 cells or more have their range increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}.
af4c4b89-18a6-4aaf-bbf8-a4e86fb33f20: Everyone in a 4-cell radius around the target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} back by <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} / 2)</u> cells.
afda9532-5898-4500-b42d-4a4420efcf01: The psyker unleashes a torrent of psyker's staff power level flaming projectiles, each dealing (from 1 to {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's staff power level) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines. Creatures that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by 2 or more projectiles gains the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilDegradationGlossary}warp{/g} burn effect. Warp Burn: deals (psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2 + psy rating) damage to the target at the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, with (5 × (psy rating)% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −(5 × psyker's psy rating) {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
b3558251-0e95-42a7-a208-7591c96faa33: The psyker gains +{uip|ArmourAgainstFire|52a24c4f709741489b8a0034109ecfdb}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against fire {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and half this amount as additional armour against {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} from las, melta, and plasma weapons.
b48be4eb-5708-4409-a44a-027b6f3632ea: Everyone in a 4-cell radius around the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} back by <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} / 2)</u> cells.
b4b38f3f-9748-40e8-9b91-2f3e984a9e00: {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Critical hits{/g} scored by anyone within the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} (including the psyker themselves) increase the psyker's critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1% until the end of combat. Stacks.
b7702670-9cba-496c-9668-378ec4ff452e:
The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. If the test succeeds, the psyker also suffers the same {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
ba986531-0c72-4f0e-ad32-dbb29d486ac7: Deals the same {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} as the Purge Soul {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} to every enemy in a cone.
bac79307-8d7b-4141-9e2c-c6ede500a262: Every time an enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the psyker, that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −3%. If the enemy's armour is already 0, this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is reduced by −1 instead.
bbc83bf2-6eba-4fb9-841a-270b2fa1922c: The psyker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} back by <u>psy rating</u> cells.
bbed7946-3bac-41f3-ba1f-45de6c4cc584:
Whenever the psyker uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on themselves or an area effect psychic power that only targets the psyker, they can use that psychic power again this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and without affecting the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} or triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
This second use of the psychic power cannot affect the psyker.
bfb2fa6d-285e-43f6-8d83-bf9164ff326b: Whenever the psyker is healed or heals any ally, if the character being healed is already at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, that character instead gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the healing. These temporary wounds do not stack.
c33d691f-3adf-414a-a955-2f31a9fc2bb5: At the beginning of every combat, the psyker's allies gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. The first critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} removes this effect.
c41f29eb-12ae-481f-ab21-235f23a44db4: All allies in a circle with a 5-cell radius gain +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Every additional stack of this effect increases the resolve {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} by +2.
c568210d-5507-408a-a6b0-55070df80445: All allies affected by Word of the Emperor are healed for (from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.
cad8e19f-e9dc-44c7-89d2-82aee1662238: Chains up to 6 targets within a 6-cell radius, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.
ce945527-afe9-4d0c-ae2b-44f90c503aff:
This character is an unsanctioned psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.
All {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} used by this character have 5% chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and are resolved as if the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} was +1 level higher.
cf20b8de-ce4b-4411-a48b-279feeb6a54e: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.
cf2da649-7712-498a-b83e-4cd76120ebb8: All the psyker's attacks, including damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, now poison enemies. This poison deals {uip|Damage|c31aa2454d10447db0f279883bc5904a} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
d08a507b-d071-411a-acd6-835f2ec0d972: The psyker unleashes a torrent of (2 × psyker's staff power level) flaming projectiles, each deals (from 1 to (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}) + psyker's staff power level) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The projectiles have an 80% chance to fly along the central line, and a 20% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines. Creatures that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by 2 or more projectiles gains the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilDegradationGlossary}warp{/g} burn effect. Warp Burn: deals (psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2 + psy rating) damage to the target at the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, with (5 × psy rating)% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −(5 × psyker's psy rating) {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} cannot be affected by Rapid Fire {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
d1d2077f-50c4-4323-8b41-c092c00b327b: Creates an area that lasts until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Аll allies within that area gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|f03c1b80631e412490316e47528c211f}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Their dodge chance cannot be less than {uip|DodgeMinimum|f03c1b80631e412490316e47528c211f}%.
d5589c7e-5838-4215-abed-1c2d4d1cbcfd: The target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
d591feee-c152-4e6d-b2b9-efd89985b4ff: Whenever the psyker heals themselves or another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} or an effect applied by a psychic power, this healing can critically heal with a chance of {uip|CritChance|d46817aabd934faeb9187cfcddb64f26}%. This critical heal chance is increased by all the effects that increase {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}, and the amount healed is increased by the same value as critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
d64ca2f4-d170-4d60-8177-87a96d048a7d: The psyker assaults the targets with a telekinetic strike, dealing <u>((from 1 to 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and attempts to knock the targets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to stay on their feet.
d89ac4ac-58eb-4022-91a3-1c1246340198: Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.
d8e37ab8-47da-4da9-b947-af702e28505f:
The target does not stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and no longer makes {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that ally makes inflicts full burning {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.
dab1dc67-8c4a-46a2-9441-e776afa409ec: Lightning strikes the psyker and {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} targets around them (both allies and enemies), dealing <u>(2 × psy rating)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to them.
dcc3ffa1-cd48-4dcd-9fa7-fa168064724b: While the psyker is not in the target's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}, or the psyker is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} of the target suffer a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|f92bf6d353374502953387488d2ba3e2} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
dcd9e3aa-172b-4e62-9ba0-1fe3a352ffc6: Allies under the effect of at least one {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} gain an additional +{uip|ArmourPenetrationBonus|119525ff526c431c9a931d6f655e3f09}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
dd68485d-b0c7-4eba-81f8-62614736136f: Until the end of combat, the target ally increases their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by +{uip|MovementPoints|b83829b067534eb0aaadab90b4d86452}, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by +{uip|MovementPoints|b83829b067534eb0aaadab90b4d86452}, and their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} by +1.
e01a15f0-a48c-4fa3-9884-ec24574dbd77: This character is a psyker, albeit quite a weak one.
e0a72b71-fecc-4b0c-8f46-b93c1eccac0c: A concentration of faith, sanctic powers are used by pious psykers to protect allies and smite heretics.
e17088a2-8fef-4af4-8d3c-07288af53661: The psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to everyone within a 7-cell radius cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
e52b434d-fee7-442a-a4a2-346f97da8fd6: Sanctioned psykers have reduced (−20%) chances to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}.
e5a7868b-b3dd-4d97-86ea-6c23f55aa124: Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.
e7a6859a-14b4-4770-8001-4b7fe524977f: The psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is increased by +{uip|CriticalChance|b6376104794047bba38e857dff3e4202}%.
e85245da-f5b4-4484-b24d-eed43aa7fa75: The psyker and everyone in a 4-cell radius suffer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
ed4933d2-f051-420a-a43a-a57658d8b9e7: At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.
eda3f220-d752-4481-b524-e69e0f12b195: The target makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If that {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target immediately attacks its allies. After, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g}, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerPenalty|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat. If the test succeeds, the target just suffers damage from Psychic Scream, and their Willpower is reduced by −{uip|WillpowerReduction|a38a9a446f094782a8bc871ce473024b} until the end of combat.
ee6496b2-a292-417e-bd9a-f6beef131476: The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that the psyker deals until the end of combat.
ee8b3282-0676-444c-a6bc-da322df3cf20: If an ally is already under the effect of one of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the psyker can target that ally with a single-target psychic power regardless of the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}.
ef4afe8e-ee8b-43e2-93b9-84b49e607f8f: The first {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attempt of every enemy in combat suffers a −{uip|DodgePenalty|ced3039da8724fcea4690f614db18d6c}% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
f03ce15c-d38e-4867-a02d-e13a229f1650: Sword of Faith — Cone of Flame
feaf78b1-9483-44d3-b60d-3eb3e203aef5: Divination specialises in gleaning information and using it to {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} fortune in your favour. Diviners find useful insights everywhere, manifesting extrasensory {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and glimpsing the future.
ffa45520-38c7-4e6e-ab42-dcb30286fd35: Until the end of combat, all targets within the area suffer a −{uip|StatPenalty|0fd6606266b245d19127ff2bf44e0d52} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +{uip|DamageBonus|0fd6606266b245d19127ff2bf44e0d52}% increase to all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
